name: Head of Research and Development
description: Leading the development team of two industrial automation control and live data visualization platforms.
about:
OPAS engineering group is an offshore and onshore engineering services company oriented in industrial automation and HVAC solutions. I have started my job as a junior PLC technician for BOP package maintenance and re-programming made by Schlumberger and implementing an anti-collision system on top of the NOV DRAWWORKs package on the IRAN AMIR KABIR offshore drilling jacket operating in the Caspian sea.
Five months later, OPAS started the R&D department to develop a remote operation control dashboard for various use cases in industrial automation, which lead me to start my new position as the head of the R&D department in OPAS.
duties:
- Close collaboration with customers and stakeholders
- Recruitment of project managers and development team
- Supervising the development process and goal alliance
- Projects budgeting
- Planning and providing the needed infrastructure
- Integrations designing in collaboration with the engineering team
- Leading the license agreements process with third-party companies
- supervising the delivery VS investment balance

name: Project Manager
description: Managing a production line automation project.
about: SPS.eng is a subsidiary company of OPAS engineering group, specialized in production line automation. After two years in the R&D of the OPAS engineering group, I challenged myself to a whole new game. I moved to SPS.eng to manage a critical project with more than twenty staff members in the Sutmachine machinery factory. The project was a two-year automation design and implementation process for the orchestration of over 150 different pieces of equipment.
duties:
- Project planning and staging based on waterfall method
- Budget, integration and implementaion planning
- Procurement planning
- Daily collaboration with design team
- Close collaboration with customer team
- Task allocation

name: Product Owner
description: Product Owner in the development of web and mobile interfaces of a Smart Home solution.
about: ZAMAN.tech is a startup company working on smart home solutions. I joined ZAMAN as a Product Owner to deliver their expectations on developing a mobile application to the contractor company's development team. I was bridging between the hardware and software design teams to smooth up their integration process.
duties:
- supervising the development plan and agility
- defining the hardware-related matters to the software design team as a domain specialist
- Removing the impediments through the development process
- Daily collaboration with the development team and scrum master
- delivery of the demos and products to stakeholders

name: Corporate Advisor
description: Helping the founder and CEO with the organization processes and implementation of Agile methodology in the development team.
about: TechClass is an Elearning startup company providing a learning management system and high-quality IT courses. I joined the team when it was just founded. I provided advisory services in organization setup and operations, also was in charge of Agile scrum methodology implementation in the development team.
duties:
- Consulting CEO through organization matters
- Supervising the Agile scrum methodology implementation
- Analysis and review of the development reports

name: Trainee
about: LIVION.oy is a technology company providing IT consultancy services next to software and IoT products of its own. I joined the LIVION as an IoT and web development trainee regarding my work placement in IT engineering studies at Centria university of applied sciences.
duties:
- Web frontEnd software development
- IoT hardware and software development

name: RDI Developer
about:
Centria University of applied sciences is a multidisciplinary organization with +300 staff members and +4000 students operating in three different major cities in the Ostrobothnia region in Finland. The R&D department of Centria is providing development services in different fields of science and technology.
The digitalization team is one of the major parts of Centria's R&D, participating in +30 different nationwide and international R&D projects and providing development services for a variety of private companies.
I joined Centria's digitalization R&D team in 2020 as a full-time RDI developer while I still was a student at Centria UAS. Nowadays, I am working on two EU-funded projects, as a system architect and lead developer in the Biline2 project and as a software developer in the Hybgeo project, and also on some other private customer projects.
duties:
- Research on new technologies and solutions and how to implement them in different applications
- Collaboration with partners and stakeholders in different projects to cope with their expectations
- Acting as an efficient team player within the development team in different projects
- System architecture design and implementation
- Leading development team and task allocation
- Software development based on projects specifications
- Technical documentation
- Technical investigation and report
- Maintaining knowledge base due to new findings and implementations
- Technical supervising trainees and student projects

name: Lecturer
description: Teaching programming and science courses in IT engineering and Business-ERP bachelor programs.
about:
Centria University of applied sciences is a multidisciplinary organization with +300 staff members and +4000 students operating in three different major cities in the Ostrobothnia region in Finland. Centria is providing cutting-edge technology studies in IT engineering programs within different campuses in Finnish and English to a variety of students from +20 different nationalities.
I joined the teaching group in the IT engineering program in January 2021 as a programming and science course teacher. I teach various courses such as basics in programming, mathematics for computing, algebra, geometry, trigonometry, and physics. Besides all these, I also have mentoring sessions for ICT students to map a road on how to get ready to start their careers in the industry after graduation.
